about_the_game:
Are you ready for adventure? Collect loot, destroy enemies, learn magic, craft your own items and head out on epic quests to conquer the evil that lurks beneath the earth. Play Alone or with friends; Legendary Tales is the ultimate fantasy VR experience.


Grow your own unique character through gameplay and work your way through an extensive skill tree.


Supports Up-to 4 player Co-op


Master the art of magic and destroy enemies with fire, ice and lightning.


Collect an almost limitless amount of items thanks to random number generation.


An amazing physics based fighting system with destructible objects and scenery.


Craft your own items,potions and upgrade crafted items with an in depth crafting system.



Are you ready to step down into the darkness? Explore winding roads and ruined castles that will take you down to the heart of the underworld, to defeat the evil corrupting the land. But be careful down there, the road is dangerous so you best bring a friend. Traverse the landscape, Bludgeon, slice and decimate skeletons with melee weapons, sneak up on a goblin with ranged weapons or destroy a demon from afar with destructive magic.
Physics based melee combat, Improved Ai, an immersive crafting system, a myriad of weapons and up to 4 player co-op; this is an RPG, fantasy, adventure that is waiting for you to create your own Legendary Tales.






    Built from the ground up for VR; Legendary Tales will throw you into an immersive fantasy world, suitable for any PCVR platform with customisable graphics settings to ensure you get the smoothest possible experience.



    Up to 4 players can play Legendary Tales in co-op mode. Grab some friends, trade some items, and head down into the dungeon to fight your way through the darkness together.


    The physics in Legendary Tales was built to mimic the way real weapons feel and act as close as possible while still being fun to play. Weapons have their own weight so that larger swings will do more damage. Not only that but enemies and destructible items also react to how hard you hit them for a truly engaging experience.



    Want to try sneaky kills with a dagger? Hit your enemies from afar with a bow? Or just mash some faces with a morning star? There are a host of different weapon types to suit your play style so find what works for you! And for every weapon type you will find so many variations on their stats thanks to random number generated items. The items are classed into five categories ranging from normal to Legendary. which not only look awesome but have special abilities. What abilities? You’ll have to get one for yourself to find out.


    As you fight your way through the world, your character will grow based on how you play. But there’s more to growth than just how you fight, work your way through the magic and skills available to truly bring your character to the next level.



    Weapons are fun and all but through the skill tree you can improve your abilities with combat skills or find yourself a Legendary item with their own special abilities and even more, you can upgrade their skills!



If hunting for weapons in the dungeons isn’t for you then we have good news! You can create your own weapons with ingredients found on your adventures, or by honing the weapons you’ve collected. You can also make potions to prepare deep dungeon crawling and disassemble items you found during your adventures to get ingredients and enhance your crafted weapons or potions with them.



Get ready for an epic adventure in VR! Put on your headset, find some friends and head into the dungeon to start creating your own Legendary Tales.

Discord Community


Click image to join our Discord server

name: Legendary Tales

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700k or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 ti or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: If you want to be a host for Co-op play, you must have good CPU such as i7-10700k or greater
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700k / AMD Ryzen 3800X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2080 / AMD RX 6700XT or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Legendary tales is a VR Action roleplaying game with up to 4 player co-op. Collect items, enhance your abilities and fight your way through an ever changing dungeon to make your own Legendary Tales.
